creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: abstract portrait of a woman made up of white arcing lines on mottled brown/tan ground; shin hanga (bijin-ga)
marks: Signature, Title, Date and Seal LLC in bottom margin, in pencil: [German Girl]; LR
title: German Girl
